charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1101_0100_:
One particularly blustery day, 
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Skyla and
Winona gazing up at the sky.
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1201_0200_:
We’ve got some strong gusts today! l bet they’ll
keep picking up speed, too!
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1201_0300_:
I can feel it... I feel the power of the wind as it
breathes around us.
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1101_0400_:
Just as [Name:PlayerNickname ] was about to
call out to them, a gust of wind rushed through
the air.
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1101_0700_:
Skyla and Winona took off and were gone with
the wind.
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1201_0800_: That was lovely. Let’s do this again sometime.
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1201_0900_: Yeah, absolutely! I’m so glad I got to fly with you!
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_0401_1200_: The wind was so nice, I went flying with Winona!
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_0401_1300_:
I ran into her earlier. I guess the wind brought us
to the same place!
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_0302_1400_: Are you and Winona good friends?
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_0402_1500_:
Yeah! We understand each other, without even
having to say anything!
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1201_1600_:
I guess it’s because people who like to fly are
the intuitive, free-spirited types!
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1201_1700_:
Now that I think about it, meeting Tornadus
was kinda the same, too!
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_0401_1900_:
Well... I guess it wasn’t the typical “Hey, nice to
meet ya!” kind of deal.
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_0302_2000_:
It must’ve been a
whirlwind encounter!
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_0402_2100_: Sure was! I’d even say it was a bit dramatic!
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1201_2200_:
The morning I met Tornadus, I heard about some
unusual weather from another pilot.
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1201_2300_:
Apparently, there was some kind of disturbance
making the weather unstable at the time.
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1201_2400_:
So I tried to be careful when I went flying
that day!
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1201_2500_:
Sure enough, the weather suddenly turned into a
nasty storm, and I caught the brunt of it.
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1201_2600_:
I thought of flying right back home at first, but
everyone needed help because the storms
were damaging their crops!
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1201_2700_:
So I decided to keep on flying to see what was
making the weather so unstable.
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1201_2800_:
That’s when I found Tornadus, right in the
eye of that storm.
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_0401_3000_: Yep! But we weren’t best friends right off the bat.
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_0402_3200_: Yep! It didn’t happen right off the bat, though.
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1201_3300_: Tornadus kept kicking up these huge storms.
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1201_3400_:
I wanted to stop him from doing that, so I
kept flying every time he started a storm!
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1201_3500_:
Somehow, we got to understand each other better
as we flew through all those storms.
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1201_3600_:
Before I knew it, we were always hanging out
together, like we do now!
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1201_3700_: Somehow, it just became natural to be together!
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_0301_3800_: So the storms brought you together!
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_0302_4000_:
That’s an interesting way to meet
a Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_0402_4100_:
Right? That’s what makes first-time encounters
so exciting!
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1201_4200_: You should let the wind guide you sometimes, too!
charaepi_ch0016_41_huuro/2301_1201_4300_:
You never know... It might lead you to a
new friend!
